definitions.text: the option to sell a given stock (or stock index or commodity future) at a given price before a given date
put into a certain place or abstract location
examples: Set the dogs on the scent of the missing children
Place emphasis on a certain point

definitions.text: cause to be in a certain state; cause to be in a certain relation
examples: That song put me in awful good humor

definitions.text: formulate in a particular style or language
examples: I wouldn't put it that way
She cast her request in very polite language
She put too much emphasis on her the last statement
He put all his efforts into this job
The teacher put an interesting twist to the interpretation of the story
We put the time of arrival at 8 P.M.
He put her to the torture
I put these memories with those of bygone times
